attributes.additional_details: Because the U.K. people have a right to have a Prime minister who uphold the U.K. values of decency, honesty and integrity. Mr. Johnston is mocking us all and the people in the country are deeply hurt.
attributes.background: I want Parliament to debate whether or not Boris Johnston should be forced from office because he has lied to the U.K. public and to Parliament.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
